Use Move 2024 module label syntax: `module pkg::mod;`

Struct `ObligationOwnership` appears to be a hot potato but has `drop` ability. Hot potatoes must have no abilities to enforce consumption. See: https://blog.trailofbits.com/2025/09/10/how-sui-move-rethinks-flash-loan-security/

Function `withdraw_collateral` uses coin::split without an apparent balance check. Consider adding `assert!(coin::value(&coin) >= amount, E_INSUFFICIENT)` to provide a clearer error message than the default abort.
